  \else%
    #2%
  \fi%

\begin{document}
\title{LaTeX formatting tests%
  \label{latex-formatting-tests}}
\author{}
\date{}
\maketitle

This files tests various aspects of the conversion to LaTeX, including spacing and formatting:

\begin{quote}
\begin{alltt}
alectryon latex_formatting.v -{}-backend latex
  # Coq+reST → LaTeX; produces ‘latex_formatting.tex’
\end{alltt}
\end{quote}

\setlength{\parskip}{8pt}

    \Al{sep}
    \begin{\al{output}}
      \begin{\al{messages}}
        \begin{\al{message}}
          \PY{o}{=}~\PY{o}{[(}\PY{l+m+mi}{0}\PY{o}{,}~\PY{l+m+mi}{121}\PY{o}{);}~\PY{o}{(}\PY{l+m+mi}{1}\PY{o}{,}~\PY{l+m+mi}{484}\PY{o}{);}~\PY{o}{(}\PY{l+m+mi}{2}\PY{o}{,}~\PY{l+m+mi}{1089}\PY{o}{)]}\Al{nl}

\section{Paragraph-code spacing%
  \label{paragraph-code-spacing}%
}

Some text.

\begin{alectryon}
  \begin{\al{txt}}
    \PY{c}{(*~Some~code~*)}
  \end{\al{txt}}
\end{alectryon}

Some text.

\begin{alectryon}
  \begin{\al{txt}}
    \PY{c}{(*~Some~code~*)}
  \end{\al{txt}}
\end{alectryon}

Some text.

Some text.

\begin{alectryon}
  \begin{\al{txt}}
    \PY{c}{(*~Some~code~*)}
  \end{\al{txt}}
\end{alectryon}

\begin{alectryon}
  \begin{\al{txt}}
    \PY{c}{(*~Some~code~*)}
  \end{\al{txt}}
\end{alectryon}

Some text.

\begin{DUclass}{code}
\begin{quote}
\begin{alltt}
Some code
\end{alltt}
\end{quote}
\end{DUclass}

%___________________________________________________________________________
\DUtransition

\begin{DUclass}{compound}
Some text in compound.

Some text in compound.  Spacing used to be wrong; see \url{https://sourceforge.net/p/docutils/patches/183/}.
\begin{alectryon}
  \begin{\al{txt}}
    \PY{c}{(*~Some~code~in~compound~*)}
  \end{\al{txt}}
\end{alectryon}
\begin{alectryon}
  \begin{\al{txt}}
    \PY{c}{(*~Some~code~in~compound~*)}
  \end{\al{txt}}
\end{alectryon}
Some text in compound.
\begin{DUclass}{code}
\begin{quote}
\begin{alltt}
Some code in compound
\end{alltt}
\end{quote}
\end{DUclass}
\end{DUclass}


\section{Line breaks in input-only fragments%
  \label{line-breaks-in-input-only-fragments}%
}

There should be no extra line breaks when showing only inputs:

\begin{alectryon}
  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      \PY{k+kn}{Goal}~\PY{k+kt}{True}~\PY{o}{/\PYZbs{}}~\PY{k+kt}{True}\PY{o}{.}\Al{nl}
    \end{\al{input}}
  \end{\al{sentence}}
  \Al{sep}
  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      ~~\PY{o}{\PYZhy{}}~
    \end{\al{input}}
  \end{\al{sentence}}
  \Al{sep}
  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      \PY{k+kp}{idtac}\PY{o}{.}\Al{nl}
    \end{\al{input}}
  \end{\al{sentence}}
  \Al{sep}
  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      \PY{k+kn}{Abort}\PY{o}{.}\Al{nl}
    \end{\al{input}}
  \end{\al{sentence}}
  \Al{sep}
  \begin{\al{txt}}
    \Al{nl}
  \end{\al{txt}}
  \Al{sep}
  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      \PY{k+kn}{Goal}~\PY{k+kt}{True}~\PY{o}{/\PYZbs{}}~\PY{k+kt}{True}\PY{o}{.}\Al{nl}
    \end{\al{input}}
  \end{\al{sentence}}
  \Al{sep}
  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      \PY{k+kn}{Proof}\PY{o}{.}\Al{nl}
    \end{\al{input}}
  \end{\al{sentence}}
  \Al{sep}
  \begin{\al{sentence}}

      ~~\PY{n+nb}{split}\PY{o}{.}\Al{nl}

  \end{\al{sentence}}
  \Al{sep}
  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      ~~\PY{o}{\PYZhy{}}~
    \end{\al{input}}
  \end{\al{sentence}}
  \Al{sep}
  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      \PY{k+kp}{idtac}~\PY{l+s+s2}{\PYZdq{}message\PYZdq{}}\PY{o}{.}~
    \end{\al{input}}
  \end{\al{sentence}}
  \Al{sep}
  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      \PY{n+nb}{cut}~\PY{k+kt}{True}\PY{o}{.}\Al{nl}

  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      \PY{o}{+}~
    \end{\al{input}}
  \end{\al{sentence}}
  \Al{sep}
  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      \PY{o}{\PYZob{}}~
    \end{\al{input}}
  \end{\al{sentence}}
  \Al{sep}
  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      \PY{n+nb+bp}{tauto}\PY{o}{.}~
    \end{\al{input}}
  \end{\al{sentence}}
  \Al{sep}
  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      \PY{o}{\PYZcb{}}\Al{nl}
    \end{\al{input}}
  \end{\al{sentence}}
  \Al{sep}
  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      ~~\PY{o}{\PYZhy{}}~
    \end{\al{input}}
  \end{\al{sentence}}
  \Al{sep}
  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      \PY{o}{\PYZob{}}~
    \end{\al{input}}
  \end{\al{sentence}}
  \Al{sep}
  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      \PY{k}{match~goal~with}\Al{nl}
      ~~~~~~\PY{o}{|}~\PY{n}{\PYZus{}}~\PY{o}{=\PYZgt{}}~\PY{k+kp}{idtac}\Al{nl}
      ~~~~~~\PY{k}{end}\PY{o}{.}~
    \end{\al{input}}
  \end{\al{sentence}}
  \Al{sep}
  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      \PY{n+nb+bp}{exact}~\PY{n}{I}\PY{o}{.}~
    \end{\al{input}}
  \end{\al{sentence}}
  \Al{sep}
  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      \PY{o}{\PYZcb{}}\Al{nl}

  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      \PY{k+kn}{Qed}\PY{o}{.}
    \end{\al{input}}
  \end{\al{sentence}}
\end{alectryon}

Showing outputs may still introduce line breaks:

\begin{alectryon}
  \begin{\al{sentence}}
    \begin{\al{input}}
      \PY{k+kn}{Goal}~\PY{k+kt}{True}~\PY{o}{/\PYZbs{}}~\PY{k+kt}{True}\PY{o}{.}
    \end{\al{input}}
    \Al{sep}
    \begin{\al{output}}
      \begin{\al{goals}}
